data.text: Fweny mane Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto okelona ema: Ne aneno atonga mopongʼ gi olemo mochiek.
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nopenja niya, “Amos, ineno angʼo?”
Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, “Chiengʼno wende ma iwero e hekalu nolokre mag ywak, ka ringre joma otho opie kuonde duto, kendo piny to olingʼ thi!”
E kindeno wabiro uso cham maricho e nengo maber,
Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach joka Jakobo osekwongʼore ni wiye ok nowil gi timbegi maricho.
“Donge gima kamano biro miyo piny yiengni
Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya,
Sewni mau mag lemo nolokre ywak mar tho,
Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya,
Ji nowuoth kadawo kochakore nyandwat e dho nam achiel nyaka dho nam machielo
Ji duto makwongʼore gi nying Ashima,
